snippet: Carole J. Bufford, originally inspired by Bessie Smith, brings the blues to the Metropolitan Room.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews performance by singer Carole J Bufford at the Metropolitan Room.
lead_paragraph: Carole J. Bufford, originally inspired by Bessie Smith, brings the blues to the Metropolitan Room.
